title: 06/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin compares Aaron Rodgers’ absence from OTAs to what Russell Wilson did earlier this year when he expressed his frustration with the Seahawks organization. He thinks one young star in the NBA has a serious flaw that might not be fixable. He also explains why Anthony Davis’ latest injury should not be a surprise since this has been happening his entire career. Plus, former NBA All Star Cedric Ceballos joins the show to break down the remaining NBA playoff match ups.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
